title: League Installer failing at middle of "L"
body:
Submitting logs below. 

For some reason every time I try to install it fails at out the middle point of the "L" in League 


Steps I've tried:

Disabled windows firewall during install
Deleted all old contents and tried fresh install
Disabled all services besides windows related ones
Changed resolution before after and during install

Pls god save me

replies.body: Your OS might be blocking the patcher from scanning and updating game files.  Adjusting your [Permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)is a solid first step to rule out any settings enabled by your OS.  If your issue continues please let me know and we can take a deeper look!

[Grant League permission to run on your computer!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) Let us know if these permissions haven't gotten League to run. 


http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Annie_3.jpg
